website_summaries.verdict: As an authentic Coach wallet, you're paying a lot for it, yet you receive great value and more room than you'll know what to do with.
pros: This thin, durable wallet holds your ID and all your credit cards and has a zip pocket for change as well as plenty of extra compartments
cons: At this price, you may not have much cash left to store inside the wallet

customer_reviews.title: Coach Zipper Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have this same one in black, but wanted a brown one to go with my brown Coach bag. I am very pleased with it. I have owned the black one for over 5 years and it looks just as good as the new brown one I received. It shipped and was received earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: JarheadzMom05

customer_reviews.title: Coach wristlet wallet
customer_reviews.text: Skinny, with enough compartments for what I need. No wristlet strap as described, however. Pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Bozone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for coach lovers.
customer_reviews.text: Huge coach anything fan. Love the wallet, it arrived being the exact size that I needed. So far it’s help you amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: shawn cary

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be lower quality and May not be authentic coach compared to others at store
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: Coach wallet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and lots of pockets. Excellent price for this beautiful wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Spiro

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good wallet last for yrs to come love this wallet
customer_reviews.author: jessica  allen

customer_reviews.title: perfect size and classic
customer_reviews.text: Well made, perfect size for me and a real classic.
customer_reviews.author: lildaleksec

customer_reviews.title: Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this and the fact that my phone can fit in the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Franklin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have recived wrong color and return back until know no refound
customer_reviews.author: Zakarya Al-Olayan

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is awful. It’s definitely not worth the price. It’s like something from canal street
customer_reviews.author: cynthia harvey

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely happy with my wallet
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely happy with my wallet, it matches my purse perfectly so happy I got it, and the price was fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: that it was the same as what they said it was
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: packaging is awful, not sure of authenticity
customer_reviews.text: the product looks OK, but the packaging is so third world that I have to believe these are fakes, or seconds, or something other than the real thing. In any case you will have to repackage this item if you wish to use it as a gift. I also purchased a wallet directly from coach for my wife, much more expensive of course, and the packaging was superb. My advice is to get the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: bonedocTop Contributor: Woodworking

product_meta.title: Coach's Outline Signature Accordion Zip Around Wallet
feature_bullets: Crafted in Coach's Outline Signature C jacquard fabric with leather trim and polished hardware
Zip around style with Coach logo on the front and an open slip pocket on the back
Leather and sateen fabric interior with center zippered pocket
12 card slips and multiple bill compartments
Measures approximately 7.5 inches (L) x 4 inches (H) with an MSRP of $225.00
